createList.title: Create List
createList.subtitle: Create your participant list
createList.listInfoDescription: Give your list an easily recognizable name
createList.listNamePlaceholder: e.g.: Class 3-2 Students, Annual Party Prize Pool... (Leave blank for auto-generated name)
createList.addListDescription: Choose the most suitable way to add drawing names
createList.inputPlaceholder: Enter name, press Enter or click Add
createList.nameExistsDescription: "{{name}}" is already in the list, please do not add duplicates
createList.fileImportSuccessWithDuplicates: Imported {{added}} names using {{encoding}} encoding, automatically removed {{duplicates}} duplicates
createList.fileParseErrorDescription: Please check if the file format is correct
createList.fileReadErrorDescription: Please check if the file is corrupted or try again
createList.addAtLeastOne: Please add at least one name
createList.saveSuccessDescription: List "{{name}}" has been saved to the library
createList.dataRestoredDescription: Restored previous list data containing {{count}} names
createList.jumpFailedDescription: Unable to save list data, please try again

listLibrary.title: List Library
listLibrary.subtitle: Manage your lists
listLibrary.createFirstList: Create your first list to get started
listLibrary.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete list "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
listLibrary.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} lists? This action cannot be undone.

drawConfig.title: Draw Configuration
drawConfig.subtitle: Configure your drawing rules
drawConfig.selectModeDescription: Each mode has unique animation effects and experience
drawConfig.allowRepeatDescription: When enabled, the same name can be drawn multiple times
drawConfig.gridLotteryFeature1: Only 1 winner per draw, creating focused lottery atmosphere
drawConfig.gridLotteryFeature2: Select winner through light jumping and freezing, full of ceremony
drawConfig.gridLotteryFeature3: Suitable for important prizes like annual meeting grand prizes, special awards
drawConfig.gridLotteryFeature4: Supports 6, 9, 12, 15 grid layouts, automatically adapts to name count
drawConfig.gridLotteryFeature5: When more than 15 names, system randomly selects 15 for lottery
drawConfig.gridLotteryQuantityDescription: Grid lottery focuses on single winner selection, creating stronger ceremony and anticipation
drawConfig.gridLotteryRepeatDescription: In grid mode, enable this option to fill all grids when name count is less than grid count
drawConfig.pleaseCreateListDescription: Need to create or select a list before starting the draw
drawConfig.loadFailedDescription: Unable to load list data, please recreate list
drawConfig.saveSuccessDescription: List "{{name}}" has been saved to library
drawConfig.saveHintDescription: Currently {{count}} names, grid lottery will randomly select 15 names to fill the grid
drawConfig.gridLotteryOnlyOne: Grid lottery mode can only draw 1 winner
drawConfig.nameCountHintDescription: Currently {{count}} names, system will randomly select 15 names to fill grid for lottery
drawConfig.gridLotteryTipDescription: Currently only {{count}} names, recommend enabling "Allow Repeat Winners" to fill all grids for better visual effect
